name: Obtaining Ore
description: To obtain ore, you must kill mobs for them.  All mobs that drop ore will spawn in the overworld.  You can use a few methods to farm ores including through mystical agriculture, and environmental tech void miners.

quests.name: Spider
quests.description: Spiders drop lapis, nickel, and very rarely chicken bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.

quests.name: Creeper
quests.description: Creepers drop coal, aluminum, and very rarely squid bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.

quests.name: Witch
quests.description: Witches drop diamond, iridium, and very rarely ocelot bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.

quests.name: Blaze
quests.description: Blazed drop emerald, platinum, and very rarely wolf bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.

quests.name: Zombie
quests.description: Zombies drop iron, copper and very rarely cow bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.

quests.name: Skeleton
quests.description: Skeletons drop redstone, silver, and very rarely sheep bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.

quests.name: Cave Spider
quests.description: Cave spiders drop quartz and very rarely horse bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.

quests.name: Enderman
quests.description: Endermen drop lead, yellorium and very rarely rabbit bait.

quests.name: Pigman
quests.description: Kill pigmen for gold, tin, and very rarely pig bait.

tasks.longDescription: Modded ore is more rare than vanilla ore.
